text: Idea Girl is a 1946 American comedy film directed by Will Jason and written by Charles R. Marion and Elwood Ullman. The film stars Jess Barker, Julie Bishop, Alan Mowbray, George Dolenz, Joan Shawlee and Laura Deane Dutton. The film was released on February 8, 1946, by Universal Pictures. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Jess Barker as Larry Brewster *Julie Bishop as Pat O'Rourke *Alan Mowbray as J.C. Crow *George Dolenz as Wilfred Potts *Joan Shawlee as Mabel *Laura Deane Dutton as Cynthia Winters *Arthur Q. Bryan as P.J. Maple *Sarah Padden as Old lady *Ruth Lee as Abigail Hawthorne *Virginia Christine as Evelina *Maurice Cass as Arturo Coveleski *Barton Yarborough as Pete Barlow *Charlie Barnet as Orchestra Leader ==References== ==External links== * Category:1946 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1946 comedy films Category:Universal Pictures films Category:Films directed by Will Jason Category:American black-and-white films
title: Idea Girl
